name: Picture Jigsaw Puzzles For Kids - Santa Claus - Christmas Tree and Gifts
name_original: Picture Jigsaw Puzzles For Kids - Santa Claus - Christmas Tree and Gifts
description:
Picture Jigsaw Puzzles is a classical puzzle game especially designed for the younger kids in mind but also provide hours of fun for the whole family .
It is simple ,addictive ,fun and has many different challenges.
We have try our best to do everything the way you love it .

This APP offers you:
- classical jigsaw fun with four levels of difficulty
- casual and easy controls for iPad and iPhone
- lots of colorful pictures to choose
- best way to entrain children
